pronunciation.pinyin: yǒng bù shēng xiù de luó sī dīng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: yong3 bu4 sheng1 xiu4 de5 luo2 si1 ding1

meanings.value: a "screw that never rusts" — sb who selflessly and wholeheartedly serves the Communist Party, like Lei Feng 雷鋒|雷锋[Lei2 Feng1], to whom the metaphor is attributed
